example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 尽早)) (VP (VV 未雨绸缪)))) (PU ，) (ADVP (AD 才)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 会) (VP (ADVP (AD 一下子)) (VP (LB 被) (CP-OBJ (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VP (VV 群涌)) (VP (MSP 而) (VP (VV 来))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 压力))) (VP (VV 击垮) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-2))))))))))
